DOC.brief_summary: Four period oral dose follow overnight fasting ( 1. know metabolic probe drug cocktail consist caffeine , diclofenac , esomeprazole , metoprolol , midazolam ; 2. dabigatran + cocktail ; 3. dabigatran alone ; 4. clarithromycin 3 day + cocktail + dabigatran ) . Blood sample collect pharmacokinetics 24 h. Washout period . Adverse event , haematology clinical chemistry record .
DOC.criteria: Healthy Weight least 50 kg body mass index 19 30 kg m2 Normal clinical laboratory profile No childbearing potential use adequate contraceptive measure Blood loss > 300 ml within 2 month prior first dose day Pregnancy , breastfeed Allergy hypersensitivity caffeine , diclofenac , esomeprazole , metoprolol , midazolam , dabigatran clarithromycin excipients pharmaceutical product Infection HIV , HBV HCV Participation precede 3 month concomitantly clinical drug study Suspected current drug alcohol abuse History drug alcohol abuse . Concomitant medication exception hormonal contraception . Positive result urine test drug abuse . Nicotine consumption equivalent > 5 cigarette per day
